      • getInstrument

        public it.softsolutions.bestx.model.Instrument getInstrument(it.softsolutions.marketlibraries.marketaxessfibuysidefix.messages.MarketDataSnapshotFullRefresh marketDataSnapshotFullRefresh)
                                                      throws it.softsolutions.bestx.BestXException
        Get BestX Model Instrument from a Market Axess marketDataSnapshotFullRefresh
        Parameters:
        marketDataSnapshotFullRefresh - the tradestac message
        Returns:
        an Instrument if in the message there is the ISIN code.
        Throws:
        it.softsolutions.bestx.BestXException - when unable to get the ISIN code or there is no such instrument in BestX Bond universe

        Creates a classifiedProposal (Reject) with the specified reason
        Parameters:
